reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has a great oversized fit that's not too tight, and appreciate its lightweight, soft material that's comfortable to wear. Customers like the length, with sleeves being the perfect size, and the color quality receives positive feedback.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Cropped Sweater
items.body: Very pleased with the quality and fit of this sweater. It is boxy, but that’s the style. The material is soft and comfortable, and I like the way it drapes. I am long waisted, but the length is not an issue. It washes well - I wash it in cold water and hang to dry. This mocha colored neutral goes with so many different colors and I especially love it with flowy long skirts. For reference, I am 5’4’ and weigh 154 lbs. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and stylish
items.body: Love the fit , it’s very comfortable and the color is beautiful Read more
items.author: Kelli Malone

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the sweater, swapping orange for another color
items.body: This sweater looks so cute on! I ordered orange after I saw my friend wearing gray but I’m swapping for another color because the orange is brighter than I expected. It’s more of a pumpkin/halloween shade than burnt orange. Read more
items.author: M Louise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall Sweater
items.body: Great fit & fabric. Not too heavy fabric, probably good for 3 seasons. Nice length for the sweater body & sleeve length. Looks like an Anthro dupe. I wear a 10/12 & purchased a large for a good fit. Does not hug the body. Read more
items.author: JMS 58

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for short torsos!
items.body: I struggle finding tops that don’t go to my knees because I have a shorter torso. I want something that hits mid hip. This top fit exactly the way I was hoping! I’m 5’1, more rectangle/apple shaped, 38D, 180 pounds with a short torso. This top fit oversized which is what I wanted and hit me right at my hip (enough to cover my tummy.) Quality is just decent. It’s thin, but that’s also what i wanted. Read more
items.author: KimL

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin material. Size up 2 sizes.
items.body: Not as oversized as it appears in the picture. Size up 2 sizes if you want to get the slouchier feel. Material is thin. Read more
items.author: bexican75

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall Sweater
items.body: I love this sweater. I'm 4'11" and it fits more like a petite length on me, which is the perfect cropped length. It hits a little below my hip bone, so it's long enough to wear to school. The fit is mildly boxy, but not overly so. It is a flattering fit for many body types. The fabric is of good quality. It's a good medium-weight for fall and early spring. In the deep south, it will be perfect year-round. I've already washed it twice, and it hasn't shrunk. However, I wash all of my tops on cold, delicate, and hang them to dry. So far, it's holding its shape. I like the softness and color choices. For reference, I ordered the small, and it has a generous fit if you want an overly boxy feel; size up. Read more
items.author: Amber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it - you won’t regret it
items.body: This is the perfect transitional fall sweater. Soft and lightweight, great front tuck, looks good with shorts or jeans but could also wear a jacket over it. I got a medium which is my true size but could’ve sized down to a small since it’s a tad oversized (intentionally slouchy). Read more
items.author: J. Lemmons

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Sky Blue, Blue, Grass Green, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Orange, Mint Green, Red, Rose Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
